pages.text: The world generation may look intimidating at first, but it's designed to be vanilla-friendly.$(br)$(br)Just explore as you normally would, and find cool structures along the way.

Some things to be aware of:$(br)$(li)There are floating islands. How you reach them is up to you.$(li)There are a lot of new structures that spawn, explore them to find good loot.$(li)Villages may look a little different.
